Quinoa Buddha Bowl.name: Quinoa Buddha Bowl
Quinoa Buddha Bowl.description: A vibrant, nourishing bowl featuring organic quinoa crowned with perfectly ripe avocado, crispy chickpeas, and garden-fresh vegetables. Finished with our house-made tahini-lemon dressing that brings bright, Mediterranean flavors to every bite.

Grilled Salmon with Vegetables.name: Grilled Salmon with Vegetables
Grilled Salmon with Vegetables.description: Wild-caught salmon fillet, expertly grilled to flaky perfection with a delicate char and bright citrus notes. Accompanied by tender-crisp broccoli florets and colorful bell pepper medley, all kissed with aromatic garlic and herbs.

Chocolate Chip Cookies.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Chocolate Chip Cookies.description: Our signature chocolate chip cookies, baked fresh daily. Each cookie features a perfectly crispy edge giving way to a soft, chewy center loaded with generous chunks of premium chocolate. The secret? Real butter, a touch of vanilla, and lots of love.

Greek Salad.name: Greek Salad
Greek Salad.description: A taste of the Mediterranean in every forkful. Crisp cucumbers and vine-ripened tomatoes mingle with briny Kalamata olives and authentic feta cheese, all tossed in our traditional red wine vinaigrette with oregano. Simple, fresh, and absolutely delicious.

Beef Stir Fry.name: Beef Stir Fry
Beef Stir Fry.description: Tender strips of premium sirloin wok-tossed with crisp bell peppers and onions in our savory soy-ginger sauce. Served atop a bed of fragrant jasmine rice and garnished with fresh green onions. A harmonious balance of umami, sweetness, and heat.

Avocado Toast.name: Avocado Toast
Avocado Toast.description: Artisanal sourdough bread toasted to golden perfection, then generously layered with creamy, lime-kissed avocado mash. Topped with jewel-like cherry tomato halves, a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil, and your choice of finishing salt. California dreaming on a plate.

Vegetable Curry.name: Vegetable Curry
Vegetable Curry.description: A warming, aromatic curry featuring cauliflower, carrots, and sweet peas simmered in a rich coconut milk sauce infused with curry spices, fresh ginger, and garlic. Served over fluffy basmati rice and garnished with fresh cilantro. Comfort in a bowl.

Pancakes.name: Pancakes
Pancakes.description: A stack of three fluffy, golden pancakes made from our time-tested recipe. Each pancake is light as air with a tender crumb, served with warm maple syrup and a pat of butter. The breakfast that brings back childhood memories.

Caesar Salad.name: Caesar Salad
Caesar Salad.description: The classic done right. Crisp romaine hearts tossed in our house-made Caesar dressing with anchovy, garlic, and lemon. Finished with shaved Parmesan cheese, fresh-cracked black pepper, and house-baked croutons for the perfect crunch.

Smoothie Bowl.name: Smoothie Bowl
Smoothie Bowl.description: A gorgeous, Instagram-worthy bowl blending frozen berries, banana, and nutrient-rich spinach into a thick, creamy base. Artfully topped with fresh banana slices, crunchy granola, toasted coconut flakes, and a drizzle of almond butter. Eat the rainbow!
